thread.title: SOUTH TEXAS NOSEWORK DOGS
thread.title_full: Hodges Badge Company, Inc reviewed by SOUTH TEXAS NOSEWORK DOGS

author: SOUTH TEXAS NOSEWORK DOGS
title: SOUTH TEXAS NOSEWORK DOGS
text: Since I been in charge of the ribbons for our UKC Nosework Club STND, the members and I have been very happy with the Ribbons that you have supplied. Everyone looks forward to receiving their beautiful Ribbons.
